html:
4.18.18  10:06 am   i find if i quit talking or writing for a couple of days, then myself will be cast into a speechless state. i got less and less to write out, and i sometimes think everything i write is of no value. they are just nonsense and jibberish and could thus be justly considered a waste of time. then i discover other people's writings, which i would think mostly waffle, sometimes interesting, but still a few of them make great sense. at last i discover in horror i even lose the ability to write nonsense. how to deal with this. should i just continue creating garbage and persuade myself it is okay,

     which i know clearly is not, while there seems like no improvement and also no way out? ah geez. but i would be scared even more when everything turns bleak and bland, and ''i've got nothing to say, so let it be'' stuff.
